動物用藥品名稱: 喜伯樂豬大腸桿菌、梭狀菌不活化混合菌苗
效能(適應症): 預防豬大腸桿菌、梭狀菌感染。
ingredients: E. COLI ADHESION FACTOR 08 K87 K88 AB STRAIN>=3.28×10^3 HAU;E. COLI ADHESION FACTOR 0149 K91 K88 AC STRAIN>=3.28×10^3 HAU;E. COLI ADHESION FACTOR K99 B41 STRAIN>=1.60×10^2 LU;E. COLI ADHESION FACTOR 09K(A) 103 P987 STRAIN>=6.4×10 LU;E. COLI ENTEROTOXOID >=3.20×10 CCTU;TOXOID OF TYPE C CI. PERFRINGENS STRAIN NCTC 3180 0.1ML;TOXOID OF TYPE B CI. NOVYI STRAIN NCTC 6687 0.1ML.
